titleStmt.title: The summarie of English chronicles (lately collected and published) nowe abridged and continued tyl this present moneth of Marche, in the yere of our Lord God. 1566. By J.S.
Summarie of Englyshe chronicles. Abridgements
titleStmt.author: Stow, John, 1525?-1605.

notesStmt.note: An abridgement of Stow, John "A summarie of Englyshe chronicles."
Includes a quartersheet with Stow's dedication to Sir Richard Champion, Lord Mayor--STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library, London, England.
